image.raw_results: Best posting times for Facebook are between 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM on weekdays and 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM on weekends. It is essential to consider the audience's timezone when scheduling posts to ensure maximum reach and engagement. Additionally, for Facebook, it is recommended to include visually appealing images and engaging captions to capture the audience's attention effectively.
